title: Post With Code
text:
This is a post with executable code.
This chunk executes R code
library(reticulate)
library(JuliaCall)
plot(
    rnorm(100), 
    rnorm(100),
    pch=20,
    col="dodgerblue1"
)
This chunk executes python code
import os
os.getwd()
This chunk executes Julia code

using Plots
plot(
    1:0.1:5, 
    x -> x^1.1 + log(x) * sinpi(x), 
    label=""
)

title: Research
text:
My research interests are broadly in the areas of:

Topological Data Analysis: Statistical behavior of Betti numbers, statistical inference from topological summaries, robust topological inference
Statistical Learning Theory: Reproducing kernel Hilbert spaces in probability and statistics, differential privacy
Probabilistic Methods: Hamiltonian Monte Carlo, generative models

The following is a list of my publications and preprints.











Signal Recovery from Random Dot-Product Graphs under Local Differential Privacy





Siddharth Vishwanath, Jonathan Hehir  International Conference on Artificial Intelligence and Statistics. AISTATS. (2025) [Link], [Code]









Minimax Optimality of Classical Scaling Under General Noise Conditions





Siddharth Vishwanath, Ery Arias-Castro  Submitted. (2025) [arXiv]









Stability of Sequential Lateration and of Stress Minimization in the Presence of Noise





Ery Arias-Castro, Siddharth Vishwanath  SIAM Journal on the Mathematics of Data Science. (2024) [Preprint]









Repelling-Attracting Hamiltonian Monte Carlo





Siddharth Vishwanath, Hyungsuk Tak  Submitted. (2024) [arXiv], [code]









Adversarially Robust Topological Inference





Siddharth Vishwanath, Bharath Sriperumbudur, Kenji Fukumizu, and Satoshi Kuriki  Submitted. (2022) [arXiv], [code]









On the limits of Topological Data Analysis for Statistical Inference





Siddharth Vishwanath, Kenji Fukumizu, Satoshi Kuriki, and Bharath Sriperumbudur  Foundations of Data Science. (1969) [Link], [Slides], [Talk]









Monolith Soil Core Sampling to Develop Nitrate Testing Protocol for Manure Injection





Robert J. Meinen, Douglas B. Beegle, Siddharth Vishwanath, Peter J. A. Kleinman, Louis S. Saporito, John Spargo, Heather Karsten, Justin Dillon  Soil Science Society of America Journal. Springer. (2022) [Link]









The Shape of Edge Differential Privacy





Siddharth Vishwanath, Jonathan Hehir  Theory and Practice of Differential Privacy Workshop, ICML. (2021) [Poster], [Workshop Paper]









Robust Persistence Diagrams using Reproducing Kernels





Siddharth Vishwanath, Kenji Fukumizu, Satoshi Kuriki, and Bharath Sriperumbudur  Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems. NeurIPS. (2021) [Link], [Slides], [Code], [Poster]









Bayesian Inference and Optimal Censoring Scheme under Progressive Censoring





Siddharth Vishwanath, Debasis Kundu  Advances in Reliability and System Engineering. Springer. (2017) [Link]
